comments:
Since I was getting that CHKJ4019W on my web.xml file, I tried to update the
<web-app> tag. If I delete the first two lines, I get all kinds of fun errors.
Here is the error log at the time of the error

Seems I got the same bug.
My own plugin will modify the resource "web.xml", if the project is a Dynamic 
web project and the web.xml is opened in the default editor, the modification 
will cause the same exception.

It seems that the editor got the change notification , and reproduced it again.

May it helps.

Shawn
This is fixed in the WTP 1.0.1 1/13/06 committers build.

This bug was moved to 'closed' state, since it is so old its assumed fixed and no longer useful or need further attention. Feel free to re-open, or open a new bug, if this semi-automatic processing was done in error.
